name: ROBO ROPE
description:
Movement --- WASD/Arrows/Controller

Restart ------- R

Win ----------- Complete all the levels 😎

Tutorial: You are the big robot. A laser connects you and the small robot together. The small robot will move towards you in the path of the laser. There are also special yelow/blue tiles. The big robot can collide only with the yellow tiles and the small robot only with the blue tiles. If the big robot is touching a blue special tile, the laser will not guide the small robot towards the big one until the big robot is not touching the blue special tile.
Have Fun!
